pkgmetadata.longdescription: Overview==========This will contain a simplified SDK to enable easy access to the Interana APIs.Being provided at a best-effort basis. So please use at your risk.High Level desciption of files==============================TBDInstall=======Python SDK This can be installed by using pip directly. Dependencies will be installed automatically.```pip install interanasdk```This installs a python module called interanasdk and also, a command line script which allows for easy access to the SDK.R SDKTBDUsage=====* To access the Python SDK in code, do the following:```/usr/bin/env pythonimport interanasdk```* To access the IA Query Client script, there are three positional parameters that need to be provided.In addition, there are optional parameters that can be leveraged as well.* To access Interana's Demo Cluster and do a simple count*, do:```ia_query_client tffZR6q0fbVqSBbeuvvLllLMLV0KHbuH+/DjXo9K=ER0PY/qNh+hdjEh+16DcL5Gc=BfHTJ7dE64x06YFWMbtbqtcdO90000 demo2.interana.com music```(note this will only work when you are on the Interana Corporate Network)A sample output might look like this:```$ ./ia_query_client.py tffZR6q0fbVqSBbeuvvLllLMLV0KHbuH+/DjXo9K=ER0PY/qNh+hdjEh+16DcL5Gc=BfHTJ7dE64x06YFWMbtbqtcdO90000 demo2.interana.com music-------------------------------------------Results recieved from Interana:-------------------------------------------{u'rows': [{u'values': [[u'All'], 4058569848.0]}], u'columns': [{u'type': u'array', u'label': [u'result']}, {u'type': u'number', u'label': u'measure_value'}]}-------------------------------------------End of Results-------------------------------------------```How to Contribute==================Simple. Feel free to jump in and contribute code. Some of the immediate next steps are:* R implementation - work in progress* MS-Excel (Windows only) implementation* Jupyter Notebook* Perl ImplementationSupport & License=======## SupportThe SDK is provided on a best-effort basis only. All support will be community-driven only.## LicenseWe have adopted the MIT license (see the file LICENSE.txt) for this project.
